text: @HillaryClinton You are a liar Hillary. Trump has done a lot with Covid19 and it's not his fault of the loss of many jobs because of the pandemic. Who do you think is going to believe you? everything comes from your mouth is a lie and politizicing everything. Be real one day, shut up.
